name: Mech Builder (Moemurk)
description:
Description

Choose your preferable cubes from weapon, body, shield and wheel to build your mech for the arena.

Pay attention to the time! You only have 30 sec to carry and thorw them to the center.

Build your own MIGHTY MECH and smash all enemies there!

(If you're looking for some excited battles, hard mode is the best for you!)

Control

For Android:

Follow icons on the screen to move your mech and view, or pick and throw cubes.

For Windows:

WASD - Move

Space bar - Pick or throw cubes / Dash

Left click - Shoot

Esc - Pause game

Enjoy~
